data.title: Top 90 Thriller Book RSS Feeds
data.meta_description: Thriller Book RSS Feeds list ranked by popularity based on social metrics, google search ranking, quality & consistency of RSS Feeds posts & Feedspot editorial teams review
data.text:
1. Best Thriller Books RSS Feed

RSS Feed bestthrillers.com/feed Follow RSS Blog bestthrillers.com

BestThrillers is a book club that helps fans of mysteries and thriller eBooks discover amazing writers and the eBooks they publish. Unlike traditional book clubs, there are no monthly fees or purchases required. We are the only such service dedicated soley to connecting mystery & thriller fans to the writers they love.

Facebook Followers 1.5KTwitter Followers 16.7K Frequency 1 post / week Export RSS feeds list Get access to 250k active RSS feeds of news websites, blogs, magazines and podcasts with email contacts in 1500 niche categories. Get targeted RSS list in your niche at your fingertips. Email us the categories of RSS feeds you're interested in at anuj@feedspot.com Copy email. We'll share the list in an Excel spreadsheet or CSV format.Email us Export RSS List

2. The Big Thrill RSS Feed

RSS Feed thebigthrill.org/feed Follow RSS Blog thebigthrill.org

The Big Thrill is the official magazine of the International Thriller Writers (ITW), an honorary society for authors of thrillers, including genres like murder mystery, suspense, horror, and espionage. The magazine features interviews, new releases, and articles aimed at promoting the thriller genre. ITW's mission is to recognize and advance the work of thriller writers through innovative programs, mentoring, and events such as ThrillerFest. The magazine and the organization work to support authors at all stages of their careers and promote literacy and libraries.

Facebook Followers 13.1KTwitter Followers 11.3K Frequency 10 posts / week

3. Mystery Sequels RSS Feed

RSS Feed mysterysequels.com/feed Follow RSS Blog mysterysequels.com

Mystery Sequels is an online resource for lovers of mystery, thriller, spy, adventure and suspense books with a sequel. If an author writers a book series, we review it.

Facebook Followers 943Twitter Followers 364 Frequency 4 posts / year

4. Thriller/Suspense Film and Writing Festival RSS Feed

RSS Feed thrillersuspensefestival.com.. Follow RSS Blog thrillersuspensefestival.com

Submit your work for FULL FEEDBACK, plus get it performed/showcased at the monthly festival.

Frequency 2 posts / month Since Jul 2015

5. Men Reading Books RSS Feed

RSS Feed menreadingbooks.blogspot.com.. Follow RSS Blog menreadingbooks.blogspot.com

Book summaries and opinions written by guys who favor mysteries and thrillers with some non-fiction thrown in to keep us honest. Over 700 reviews and counting.

Facebook Followers 915 Frequency 4 posts / week

6. Crime Time Podcast RSS Feed

RSS Feed crimetimepod.com/feed Follow RSS Blog crimetimepod.com

Time Podcast is the Crime Fiction brainchild of Australian podcasters, Lee and Eddie. With bookish discussions, reviews, interviews and gossip, this podcast centres on crime, mystery, thriller, suspense and horror fiction.

Twitter Followers 3.6KInstagram Followers 1.4K Frequency 2 posts / week Since Sep 2015

7. DARK ART FOR DARK SOULS RSS Feed

RSS Feed alariccabiling.net/feed Follow RSS Blog alariccabiling.wordpress.com

My name is Alaric Cabiling, and I am the author of short story collections, Insanity By Increments, Redefining Darkness, The Claws of Perdition, and Hotel Insomnia. I love writing about my favorite books and authors in the aforementioned genres.

Twitter Followers 593 Frequency 1 post / week

8. Jessicamap Reviews RSS Feed

RSS Feed jessicamapreviews.com/feed Follow RSS Blog jessicamapreviews.com

I'm Jessica. I'm in my 20's and have always had a love for reading. I hope you enjoy my reviews and photos that I share on my blog. You'll see mainly genres that I'm in love with (thrillers, horror, suspense, historical fiction) because it's not entirely fair to review genres that I'm not the target audience for. You'll see some book mail and then book events that I can make it to.

Twitter Followers 546 Frequency 2 posts / week

9. Books And Emma Blog RSS Feed

RSS Feed booksandemma.wixsite.com/blo.. Follow RSS Blog booksandemma.wixsite.com

A blog by Emma, a Dyslexic Book Reviewer who is passionate about books and reading since childhood. Dedicated to the reading and reviewing of thriller, mystery, suspense, and psychological twist and turn books.

Twitter Followers 1.6KInstagram Followers 760 Frequency 2 posts / month

10. Nishita's Rants and Raves » Chills/Thrills/Spills RSS Feed

RSS Feed nishitak.com/category/books/.. Follow RSS Blog nishitak.com

Discover the thrilling and chill-inducing books with the book reviews published in this section. A technical writer from Bangalore who likes to read and who likes to write about what she reads

Facebook Followers 5.4KInstagram Followers 17.2K Frequency 1 post / month

11. Whispering Stories » Thriller RSS Feed

RSS Feed whisperingstories.com/tag/th.. Follow RSS Blog whisperingstories.com

Dive into the world of thrillers with our book reviews, author interviews and more! Whispering Stories ran its first post back in February 2015. Now with a team of dedicated reviewers, we share our love of all things bookish.

Instagram Followers 4.1K Frequency 2 posts / week

12. Book Riot » Mystery/Thriller RSS Feed

RSS Feed bookriot.com/category/genre/.. Follow RSS Blog bookriot.com

Whatever your mystery fiction flavor, we've got recommendations on the best mystery books out there, from diverse authors writing in every mystery sub-genre. Get your whodunit (orwhatdunit, if you like a supernatural mystery) fix with posts from our mystery/thriller-reading contributors. The largest independent literary site in North America, bringing you news, commentary, and recs for readers of all stripes.

Facebook Followers 892.1KInstagram Followers 300.2K Frequency 1 post / week

13. Books on the 7:47 » Psychological thriller RSS Feed

RSS Feed booksonthe747.com/category/f.. Follow RSS Blog booksonthe747.com

Explore the psychological thriller section for Book Review, Author Interviews and All Things Bookish. Hello! I'm Jen and I've been writing book reviews since 2009, just in the old-school way of pen on paper in a notebook. I started doing that to - partly - never forget the different books I'd read through the years and - partly - to have as a reference for when I wanted a book to suit a certain mood.

Facebook Followers 66Instagram Followers 1.9K Frequency 2 posts / month

14. The Reading Cafe » Thriller RSS Feed

RSS Feed thereadingcafe.com/tag/thril.. Follow RSS Blog thereadingcafe.com

Discover our collection of thriller books and book reviews. The Reading Cafe- There are two of us who started this site, as a means to express our love of all things pertaining to books. Whether it be a review, an author or model interview, a fun post, or anything that is informative.

Facebook Followers 129 Frequency 2 posts / week

15. A Couple of B's » Mystery/Thriller RSS Feed

RSS Feed coupleofbeesread.com/categor.. Follow RSS Blog coupleofbeesread.com

Explore the book reviews and summaries of different old and new mystery thrillers. Becky and Kayla are a mother-in-law and daughter-in-law who get along! They read, review, and blog about books.

Facebook Followers 317Instagram Followers 4.7K Frequency 1 post / week

16. BigAl's Books and Pals » Thriller RSS Feed

RSS Feed Follow RSS Blog booksandpals.blogspot.com

Explore Reviews and more from the world of the Kindle on thrillers, mystery and suspense. An avid reader for more decades than he wants to admit, BigAl has reviewed music for a variety of websites and magazines. After having several readers and authors tell him, 'You ought to start a book blog,' he said, 'what the hell.'

Frequency 1 post / week

17. Artisan Book Reviews » Thriller RSS Feed

RSS Feed artisanbookreviews.com/categ.. Follow RSS Blog artisanbookreviews.com

Find Captivating Professional Book Reviews, Book & Author Promotions, Author Spotlights, Author Interviews, Book & Author Extensive Marketing to Increase Book Sales & Author Visibility, Social Media Book Promotion. Artisan book Reviews is passionate about books and the reading experience. Our goal is to provide readers with the very best hand picked fiction books written by remarkable and talented authors who have over-the-top captivating imaginations, outstanding writing abilities and unique stories to tell.

Facebook Followers 3.3K Frequency 1 post / quarter

18. book'd out » Thriller & Suspense RSS Feed

RSS Feed bookdout.wordpress.com/categ.. Follow RSS Blog bookdout.wordpress.com

This section features my reviews on thriller and suspense books I have read. I'll be adding reviews of the books I read - don't expect erudite literary critique, I tend to just write about what I did or didn't like about a book. I try very hard to avoid spoilers and I am not interested in denigrating anyone, no book bashing allowed.

Facebook Followers 1.9K Frequency 1 post / week

19. The Eclectic Review » Thriller RSS Feed

RSS Feed eclecticreview.com/category/.. Follow RSS Blog eclecticreview.com

Explore my collection of thriller books, popular and underdogs, book reviews and more! My name is Sharon from Iowa and I am an avid reader of just about every genre. If I'm not working in my garden, I'm writing reviews here, for Amazon, LibraryThing, GoodReads, and other venues as requested.

Facebook Followers 184Instagram Followers 959 Frequency 5 posts / quarter

20. I've read this » Thriller RSS Feed

RSS Feed ivereadthis.com/category/boo.. Follow RSS Blog ivereadthis.com

My name is Anne Logan, and like you, I adore reading books. In 2013, I started this blog, a place where I post my reviews of recently released books. In addition to reviewing books online, I review for publications such as Alberta Views, Freefall Magazine, and Quill and Quire. Explore this section for my favorite from the thriller genre.

Facebook Followers 3.4K Frequency 1 post / quarter

21. Independent Book Review » Mystery, Thriller, & Suspense RSS Feed

RSS Feed independentbookreview.com/ta.. Follow RSS Blog independentbookreview.com

Independent Book Review is your source for the best new books by small press and independent authors. Whether you're a reader looking for your next favorite read or a writer hoping to get your book reviewed, you've come to the right place. Browse our listed of mystery, thriller and suspense books.

Facebook Followers 1.1KInstagram Followers 2.8K Frequency 7 posts / year

22. The Kindle Book Review » Thriller RSS Feed

RSS Feed thekindlebookreview.net/cate.. Follow RSS Blog thekindlebookreview.net

Explore the new thrillers in the market, upcoming releases and more! We are a book review and promotion site but we NEVER charge for reviews. There other other sites that have tried to imitate us. We are The Kindle Book Review dot Net. We've reviewed over 1,750 books on Amazon since 2009. We promote quality ebooks and authors, post author resources, and we've sponsored the annual 'Kindle Book Awards' since 2012 with industry pros like Digital Book Today, K-Boards, Author Marketing Club, Bargain Booksy, and others.

Frequency 1 post / day

23. Thriller Magazine Blog RSS Feed

RSS Feed thrillermagazine.org/feed Follow RSS Blog thrillermagazine.org

Bringing you the best established and new voices in the thriller genre! Magazine that publishes fiction in the thriller genre!

Frequency 1 post / year

24. Chick Lit Café » thrillers RSS Feed

RSS Feed chicklitcafe.com/category/th.. Follow RSS Blog chicklitcafe.com

Discover the new thriller books with our book reviews. We Write Professional Captivating Book Reviews & Run Highly Effective 'Targeted' Book Marketing Campaigns.

Facebook Followers 6.2K Frequency 4 posts / quarter

25. The Real Book Spy RSS Feed

RSS Feed therealbookspy.com/feed Follow RSS Blog therealbookspy.com

Since launching The Real Book Spy, Steck has broken relevant industry news, written hundreds of book reviews, and conducted interviews with many of the genre's top thriller authors on his way to becoming one of the most respected voices among thriller fans.

Facebook Followers 4.3KTwitter Followers 16.1KInstagram Followers 2.1K Frequency 3 posts / day

26. Booklover Book Reviews » Thriller RSS Feed

RSS Feed bookloverbookreviews.com/cat.. Follow RSS Blog bookloverbookreviews.com

Read hundreds of book reviews, wide range of titles from thriller genre by Australian and international authors. Hi! I'm Jo, and I'm an unabashed book lover living in Brisbane, Australia. Since starting this website in 2009 I've come to realise I enjoy writing about books almost as much as reading them, and Booklover Book Reviews has become a much-valued creative outlet for me.

Facebook Followers 3.2K Frequency 4 posts / quarter

27. NewInBooks » Thriller RSS Feed

RSS Feed newinbooks.com/category/thri.. Follow RSS Blog newinbooks.com

You are what you read. Follow us to hear about the best new books in thriller genres. We post book releases, news, fun quotes, and literary love. We believe you should spend your time reading, not searching. That's why NewInBooks alerts you to all the newest books in your favorite genres.

Facebook Followers 43.5KInstagram Followers 13K Frequency 2 posts / week

28. Long and Short Reviews » Mystery/Suspense RSS Feed

RSS Feed longandshortreviews.com/cate.. Follow RSS Blog longandshortreviews.com

Discover new mystery/suspense books with our detailed reviews of various books. Long and Short Reviews opened its doors August 27, 2007. As of 12/31/12 we've reviewed more than 8900 books and short stories.

Frequency 1 post / week

29. The Bookish Elf » Mystery Thriller RSS Feed

RSS Feed bookishelf.com/category/fict.. Follow RSS Blog bookishelf.com

Follow to Read Book Summaries and Reviews, about Author's Life and Work, Book Suggestions and many more literary Posts on thrillers at one place. We offer genuine and custom-tailored Book Marketing Services.

RSS Feed damppebbles.com/feed Follow RSS Blog damppebbles.com

Crime fiction blog featuring reviews, author guest posts and other fabulous booky things (with the odd psychological thriller and horror novel making an appearance!) Hello. My name is Emma and damppebbles is my baby. I'm in my early forties and live in South Oxfordshire with my husband and two young children.

Facebook Followers 1KInstagram Followers 8.4K Frequency 3 posts / week

RSS Feed mmcheryl.wordpress.com/tag/p.. Follow RSS Blog mmcheryl.wordpress.com

RSS Feed novelsuspects.com/tag/thrill.. Follow RSS Blog novelsuspects.com

RSS Feed thelitbuzz.com/category/genr.. Follow RSS Blog thelitbuzz.com

Facebook Followers 7.3KInstagram Followers 3.1K Frequency 5 posts / year

34. Barnsey's Books » Thriller RSS Feed

RSS Feed Follow RSS Blog barnseysbooks.com

I'm passionate about books. I read, review, and recommend a wide variety of thriller books and authors. I'm Lynne and I'd like to welcome you to my blog. The books I read and review come from a number of different sources including contacts within the publishing world, advance copies from specialist reviewer websites, those offered to me through my blog and books I've purchased myself.

Frequency 1 post / month

Explore my reviewed thriller books in this section. I'm an award-winning blogger at www.crimebookjunkie.co.uk. I am also a PR & Social Media Manager for Bookouture, a leading digital publisher in the UK, and I was a regular reviewer on the Two Crime Writers and a Microphone podcast.

RSS Feed jenmedsbookreviews.com/categ.. Follow RSS Blog jenmedsbookreviews.com

Posts about Crime, Thrillers and Mystery written by Jen Lucas. I'm Jen Lucas, a blogger who loves all things literature. Reading is one of my favourite ways to spend my spare time when I'm not travelling the UK and Ireland with my full time work.

Facebook Followers 644Twitter Followers 7.6KInstagram Followers 1.3K Frequency 1 post / day Since May 2016

Find the largest collection of the must-read Thriller, Murder Mystery & Crime Novels. India's best book blog, Trusted by over 90,000 readers

RSS Feed Follow RSS Blog caffeinatedbookreviewer.com

Reviews, news, author information, guest posts, blog tours and giveaways from the thriller genre. I am an avid reader, audiobook junkie and coffee drinker.

Editor-in-Chief Mike Stotter has been involved in the crime scene for over twenty-five years. He is an award-winning children's non-fiction writer and has contributed to anthologies ranging from science fiction, crime through to the Old West.

Frequency 1 post / week

44. Mystery and Suspense Magazine RSS Feed

RSS Feed mysteryandsuspense.com/feed Follow RSS Blog mysteryandsuspense.com

Mystery and Suspense Magazine serves lovers of mystery, thriller, horror, crime, and suspense fiction - books, movies, TV, and more! Founded in 2020, it offers interviews, reviews, and features with the goal of giving fans a deeper look into the fiction they love.

Her sole aim in life is to bring the awesomeness of books in front of the world and she is happy to have already addicted her 6 year old to them.

After a hiatus, she returned with her novel, BLACK PEARL, A Cold Case Suspense.

I create flash-fiction and short-short stories that can be heard in just a few minutes. Dive under the sea to swim with mermaids, learn what it's like to be a vampire in love with a werewolf in the contemporary world, and have conversations with ghosts.

That is what makes reading and reviewing interesting.

My aim for this website is to give people the chance to get an understanding of a book they're interested in before they buy it via my reviews.
